verses.verse: וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> vay-Hi, become כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher after נִבְנְתָה֙ <WH1129> niv-ne-Tah was built הַחוֹמָ֔ה <WH2346> ha-cho-Mah, Now it came to pass when the wall וָאַעֲמִ֖יד <WH5975> va-'a-'a-Mid and I had set up הַדְּלָת֑וֹת <WH1817> had-de-la-Tot; the doors וַיִּפָּ֥קְד֛וּ <WH6485> vai-yip-Pa-ke-Du were appointed הַשּׁוֹעֲרִ֥ים <WH7778> hash-sho-'a-Rim and the porters וְהַמְשֹׁרְרִ֖ים <WH7891> ve-ham-sho-re-Rim and the singers וְהַלְוִיִּֽם׃ <WH3881> ve-hal-vi-Yim. and the Levites

וָאֲצַוֶּ֞ה <WH6680> va-'a-tzav-Veh charge אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- חֲנָ֣נִי <WH2607> cha-Na-ni Hanani אָחִ֗י <WH251> 'a-Chi, That I gave my brother וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et חֲנַנְיָ֛ה <WH2608> cha-nan-Yah and Hananiah שַׂ֥ר <WH8269> sar the ruler הַבִּירָ֖ה <WH1002> hab-bi-Rah of the palace עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- charge יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> ye-ru-sha-Lim; over Jerusalem כִּי־ <WH3588> ki- for הוּא֙ <WH1931> hu he כְּאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> ke-'Ish man אֱמֶ֔ת <WH571> 'e-Met, for he [was] a faithful וְיָרֵ֥א <WH3372> ve-ya-Re and feared אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him God מֵרַבִּֽים׃ <WH7227> me-rab-Bim. above many

וַיֹּאמֶר vai-yo-mer כוָאֹמַ֣ר <WH559> va-'o-Mar answer קלָהֶ֗ם la-Hem, לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo not יִפָּֽתְח֞וּ <WH6605> yip-pa-te-Chu be opened שַׁעֲרֵ֤י <WH8179> sha-'a-Rei unto them Let not the gates יְרוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <WH3389> ye-ru-sha-Lim of Jerusalem עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- until חֹ֣ם <WH2527> chom be hot הַשֶּׁ֔מֶשׁ <WH8121> hash-She-mesh, until the sun וְעַ֨ד <WH5704> ve-'Ad and while הֵ֥ם <WH1992> hem they עֹמְדִ֛ים <WH5975> 'o-me-Dim and while they stand by יָגִ֥יפוּ <WH1479> ya-Gi-fu let them shut הַדְּלָת֖וֹת <WH1817> had-de-la-Tot the doors וֶאֱחֹ֑זוּ <WH270> ve-'e-Cho-zu; and bar וְהַעֲמֵ֗יד <WH5975> ve-ha-'a-Meid, [them] and appoint מִשְׁמְרוֹת֙ <WH4931> mish-me-rOt watches יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <WH3427> yo-she-Vei of the inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> ye-ru-sha-Lim, of Jerusalem אִ֚ישׁ <WH376> 'ish every one בְּמִשְׁמָר֔וֹ <WH4929> be-mish-ma-Ro, in his watch וְאִ֖ישׁ <WH376> ve-'Ish and every one נֶ֥גֶד <WH5048> Ne-ged front בֵּיתֽוֹ׃ <WH1004> bei-To. [to be] over against his house

וְהָעִ֞יר <WH5892> ve-ha-'Ir Now the city רַחֲבַ֤ת <WH7342> ra-cha-Vat broad יָדַ֙יִם֙ <WH3027> ya-Da-yim able וּגְדוֹלָ֔ה <WH1419> u-ge-do-Lah, and great וְהָעָ֥ם <WH5971> ve-ha-'Am but the people מְעַ֖ט <WH4592> me-'At [were] few בְּתוֹכָ֑הּ <WH8432> be-to-Chah; therein וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> ve-'Ein else בָּתִּ֖ים <WH1004> bat-Tim and the houses בְּנוּיִֽם׃ <WH1129> be-nu-Yim. [were] not builded

וַיִּתֵּ֤ן <WH5414> vai-yit-Ten put אֱלֹהַי֙ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hai And my God אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- into לִבִּ֔י <WH3820> lib-Bi, into mine heart וָאֶקְבְּצָ֞ה <WH6908> va-'ek-be-Tzah to gather together אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַחֹרִ֧ים <WH2715> ha-cho-Rim the nobles וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַסְּגָנִ֛ים <WH5461> has-se-ga-Nim and the rulers וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> ha-'Am and the people לְהִתְיַחֵ֑שׂ <WH3187> le-hit-ya-Ches; that they might be reckoned by genealogy וָֽאֶמְצָ֗א <WH4672> va-'em-Tza, And I found סֵ֤פֶר <WH5612> Se-fer a register הַיַּ֙חַשׂ֙ <WH3188> hai-Ya-chas of the genealogy הָעוֹלִ֣ים <WH5927> ha-'o-Lim of them which came up בָּרִאשׁוֹנָ֔ה <WH7223> ba-ri-sho-Nah, at the first וָאֶמְצָ֖א <WH4672> va-'em-Tza and found כָּת֥וּב <WH3789> ka-Tuv written בּֽוֹ׃ bo. פ Peh

אֵ֣לֶּה׀ <WH428> 'El-leh These בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei These [are] the children הַמְּדִינָ֗ה <WH4082> ham-me-di-Nah, of the province הָעֹלִים֙ <WH5927> ha-'o-Lim that went up מִשְּׁבִ֣י <WH7628> mish-she-Vi out of the captivity הַגּוֹלָ֔ה <WH1473> hag-go-Lah, of those that had been carried away אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher whom הֶגְלָ֔ה <WH1540> heg-Lah, had carried away נְבוּכַדְנֶצַּ֖ר <WH5019> ne-vu-chad-netz-Tzar whom Nebuchadnezzar מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech the king בָּבֶ֑ל <WH894> ba-Vel; of Babylon וַיָּשׁ֧וּבוּ <WH7725> vai-ya-Shu-vu and came again לִֽירוּשָׁלִַ֛ם <WH3389> li-ru-sha-Lim to Jerusalem וְלִיהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> ve-li-hu-Dah and to Judah אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> 'ish every one לְעִירֽוֹ׃ <WH5892> le-'i-Ro. unto his city

הַבָּאִ֣ים <WH935> hab-ba-'Im Who came עִם־ <WH5973> 'im- with זְרֻבָּבֶ֗ל <WH2216> ze-rub-ba-Vel, with Zerubbabel יֵשׁ֡וּעַ <WH3442> ye-Shu-a' Jeshua נְחֶמְיָ֡ה <WH5166> ne-chem-Yah Nehemiah עֲ֠זַרְיָה <WH5838> 'A-zar-yah Azariah רַֽעַמְיָ֨ה <WH7485> ra-'am-Yah Raamiah נַחֲמָ֜נִי <WH5167> na-cha-Ma-ni Nahamani מָרְדֳּכַ֥י <WH4782> ma-re-do-Chai Mordecai בִּלְשָׁ֛ן <WH1114> bil-Shan Bilshan מִסְפֶּ֥רֶת <WH4559> mis-Pe-ret Mispereth בִּגְוַ֖י <WH902> big-Vai Bigvai נְח֣וּם <WH5149> ne-Chum Nehum בַּעֲנָ֑ה <WH1196> ba-'a-Nah; Baanah מִסְפַּ֕ר <WH4557> mis-Par The number אַנְשֵׁ֖י <WH376> 'an-Shei of men עַ֥ם <WH5971> 'am of the people יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei The children פַרְעֹ֔שׁ <WH6551> far-'Osh, of Parosh אַלְפַּ֕יִם <WH505> 'al-Pa-yim thousand מֵאָ֖ה <WH3967> me-'Ah an hundred וְשִׁבְעִ֥ים <WH7657> ve-shiv-'Im seventy וּשְׁנָֽיִם׃ <WH8147> u-she-Na-yim. two ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei The children שְׁפַטְיָ֔ה <WH8203> she-fat-Yah, of Shephatiah שְׁלֹ֥שׁ <WH7969> she-Losh three מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> me-'ot hundred שִׁבְעִ֥ים <WH7657> shiv-'Im seventy וּשְׁנָֽיִם׃ <WH8147> u-she-Na-yim. and two ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei The children אָרַ֔ח <WH733> 'a-Rach, of Arah שֵׁ֥שׁ <WH8337> shesh six מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> me-'ot hundred חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <WH2572> cha-mish-Shim fifty וּשְׁנָֽיִם׃ <WH8147> u-she-Na-yim. and two ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> be-nei- The children פַחַ֥ת fa-Chat מוֹאָ֛ב <WH6355> mo-'Av of Pahathmoab לִבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> liv-Nei of the children יֵשׁ֖וּעַ <WH3442> ye-Shu-a' of Jeshua וְיוֹאָ֑ב <WH3097> ve-yo-'Av; and Joab אַלְפַּ֕יִם <WH505> 'al-Pa-yim two thousand וּשְׁמֹנֶ֥ה <WH8083> u-she-mo-Neh and eight מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> me-'ot hundred שְׁמֹנָ֥ה <WH8083> she-mo-Nah eight עָשָֽׂר׃ <WH6240> 'a-Sar. teen ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei The children עֵילָ֔ם <WH5867> 'ei-Lam, of Elam אֶ֕לֶף <WH505> 'E-lef a thousand מָאתַ֖יִם <WH3967> ma-Ta-yim two hundred חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <WH2572> cha-mish-Shim fifty וְאַרְבָּעָֽה׃ <WH702> ve-'ar-ba-'Ah. and four ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei The children זַתּ֔וּא <WH2240> zat-Tu, of Zattu שְׁמֹנֶ֥ה <WH8083> she-mo-Neh eight מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> me-'ot hundred אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <WH705> 'ar-ba-'Im forty וַחֲמִשָּֽׁה׃ <WH2568> va-cha-mish-Shah. and five ס sa-Mek
בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei The children זַכָּ֔י <WH2140> zak-Kai, of Zaccai שְׁבַ֥ע <WH7651> she-Va' seven מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> me-'ot hundred וְשִׁשִּֽׁים׃ <WH8346> ve-shish-Shim. and threescore ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei The children בִנּ֔וּי <WH1131> vin-Nui, of Binnui שֵׁ֥שׁ <WH8337> shesh six מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> me-'ot hundred אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <WH705> 'ar-ba-'Im forty וּשְׁמֹנָֽה׃ <WH8083> u-she-mo-Nah. and eight ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei The children בֵבָ֔י <WH893> ve-Vai, of Bebai שֵׁ֥שׁ <WH8337> shesh six מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> me-'ot hundred עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> 'es-Rim twenty וּשְׁמֹנָֽה׃ <WH8083> u-she-mo-Nah. and eight ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei The children עַזְגָּ֔ד <WH5803> 'az-Gad, of Azgad אַלְפַּ֕יִם <WH505> 'al-Pa-yim thousand שְׁלֹ֥שׁ <WH7969> she-Losh three מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> me-'ot hundred עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> 'es-Rim twenty וּשְׁנָֽיִם׃ <WH8147> u-she-Na-yim. two ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei The children בִגְוָ֔י <WH902> vig-Vai, of Bigvai אַלְפַּ֖יִם <WH505> 'al-Pa-yim two thousand שִׁשִּׁ֥ים <WH8346> shish-Shim threescore וְשִׁבְעָֽה׃ <WH7651> ve-shiv-'Ah. and seven ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei The children עָדִ֔ין <WH5720> 'a-Din, of Adin שֵׁ֥שׁ <WH8337> shesh six מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> me-'ot hundred חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <WH2572> cha-mish-Shim fifty וַחֲמִשָּֽׁה׃ <WH2568> va-cha-mish-Shah. and five ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> be-nei- The children אָטֵ֥ר <WH333> 'a-Ter of Ater לְחִזְקִיָּ֖ה <WH2396> le-chiz-ki-Yah of Hezekiah תִּשְׁעִ֥ים <WH8673> tish-'Im ninety וּשְׁמֹנָֽה׃ <WH8083> u-she-mo-Nah. and eight ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei The children חָשֻׁ֔ם <WH2828> cha-Shum, of Hashum שְׁלֹ֥שׁ <WH7969> she-Losh three מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> me-'ot hundred עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> 'es-Rim twenty וּשְׁמֹנָֽה׃ <WH8083> u-she-mo-Nah. and eight ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei The children בֵצָ֔י <WH1209> ve-Tzai, of Bezai שְׁלֹ֥שׁ <WH7969> she-Losh three מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> me-'ot hundred עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> 'es-Rim twenty וְאַרְבָּעָֽה׃ <WH702> ve-'ar-ba-'Ah. and four ס sa-Mek
בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei The children חָרִ֔יף <WH2756> cha-Rif, of Hariph מֵאָ֖ה <WH3967> me-'Ah an hundred שְׁנֵ֥ים <WH8147> she-Neim both עָשָֽׂר׃ <WH6240> 'a-Sar. ten ס sa-Mek
בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei The children גִבְע֖וֹן <WH1391> giv-'on of Gibeon תִּשְׁעִ֥ים <WH8673> tish-'Im ninety וַחֲמִשָּֽׁה׃ <WH2568> va-cha-mish-Shah. and five ס sa-Mek

אַנְשֵׁ֤י <WH582> 'an-Shei The men בֵֽית־ veit- לֶ֙חֶם֙ <WH1035> le-chem of Bethlehem וּנְטֹפָ֔ה <WH5199> u-ne-to-Fah, and Netophah מֵאָ֖ה <WH3967> me-'Ah an hundred שְׁמֹנִ֥ים <WH8084> she-mo-Nim fourscore וּשְׁמֹנָֽה׃ <WH8083> u-she-mo-Nah. and eight ס sa-Mek
אַנְשֵׁ֣י <WH376> 'an-Shei of עֲנָת֔וֹת <WH6068> a-na-Tot, of Anathoth מֵאָ֖ה <WH3967> me-'Ah an hundred עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> 'es-Rim twenty וּשְׁמֹנָֽה׃ <WH8083> u-she-mo-Nah. and eight ס sa-Mek
אַנְשֵׁ֥י <WH376> 'an-Shei he בֵית־ veit- עַזְמָ֖וֶת <WH1041> 'az-Ma-vet of Bethazmaveth אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <WH705> 'ar-ba-'Im forty וּשְׁנָֽיִם׃ <WH8147> u-she-Na-yim. and two ס sa-Mek

אַנְשֵׁ֨י <WH376> 'an-Shei he קִרְיַ֤ת kir-Yat יְעָרִים֙ <WH7157> ye-'a-Rim of Kirjathjearim כְּפִירָ֣ה <WH3716> ke-fi-Rah Chephirah וּבְאֵר֔וֹת <WH881> u-ve-'e-Rot, and Beeroth שְׁבַ֥ע <WH7651> she-Va' seven מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> me-'ot hundred אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <WH705> 'ar-ba-'Im forty וּשְׁלֹשָֽׁה׃ <WH7969> u-she-lo-Shah. and three ס sa-Mek

אַנְשֵׁ֤י <WH376> 'an-Shei of הָֽרָמָה֙ <WH7414> ha-ra-Mah of Ramah וָגָ֔בַע <WH1387> va-Ga-va', and Geba שֵׁ֥שׁ <WH8337> shesh six מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> me-'ot hundred עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> 'es-Rim twenty וְאֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> ve-'e-Chad. and one ס sa-Mek
אַנְשֵׁ֣י <WH376> 'an-Shei of מִכְמָ֔ס <WH4363> mich-Mas, of Michmas מֵאָ֖ה <WH3967> me-'Ah an hundred וְעֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> ve-'es-Rim and twenty וּשְׁנָֽיִם׃ <WH8147> u-she-Na-yim. and two ס sa-Mek

אַנְשֵׁ֤י <WH376> 'an-Shei he בֵֽית־ veit- אֵל֙ <WH1008> 'el of Bethel וְהָעָ֔י <WH5857> ve-ha-'Ai, and Ai מֵאָ֖ה <WH3967> me-'Ah an hundred עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> 'es-Rim twenty וּשְׁלֹשָֽׁה׃ <WH7969> u-she-lo-Shah. and three ס sa-Mek
אַנְשֵׁ֥י <WH376> 'an-Shei he נְב֛וֹ <WH5015> ne-Vo Nebo אַחֵ֖ר <WH312> 'a-Cher of the other חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <WH2572> cha-mish-Shim fifty וּשְׁנָֽיִם׃ <WH8147> u-she-Na-yim. and two ס sa-Mek
